trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Juniper MX SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.2.2.1.8.[{#IFNAME}].avg(7200)}<2 and {Template Juniper MX SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.2.2.1.8.[{#IFNAME}].last()}=2 and {Template Juniper MX SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.31.1.1.1.18.[{#IFNAME}].str(this_does_not_exist)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: Interface status on {HOST.HOST}: {#IFNAME}, {ITEM.VALUE2} : {ITEM.VALUE3}
trigger_prototype.description: Interface status went up to down !!! Interface : {#SNMPVALUE}, {ITEM.VALUE1} = {ITEM.VALUE3}

dependency.name: Interface status on {HOST.HOST}: {#IFNAME}, {ITEM.VALUE2} : {ITEM.VALUE3}
dependency.expression: {Template Juniper MX SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.2.2.1.8.[{#IFNAME}].avg(7200)}<2 and {Template Juniper MX SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.2.2.1.8.[{#IFNAME}].last()}=2 and {Template Juniper MX SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.31.1.1.1.18.[{#IFNAME}].str(this_does_not_exist)}=0

dependency.name: Interface status on {HOST.HOST}: {#IFNAME}, {ITEM.VALUE2} : {ITEM.VALUE3}
dependency.expression: {Template Juniper MX SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.2.2.1.8.[{#IFNAME}].avg(7200)}<2 and {Template Juniper MX SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.2.2.1.8.[{#IFNAME}].last()}=2 and {Template Juniper MX SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.31.1.1.1.18.[{#IFNAME}].str(this_does_not_exist)}=0

dependency.name: Interface status on {HOST.HOST}: {#IFNAME}, {ITEM.VALUE2} : {ITEM.VALUE3}
dependency.expression: {Template Juniper MX SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.2.2.1.8.[{#IFNAME}].avg(7200)}<2 and {Template Juniper MX SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.2.2.1.8.[{#IFNAME}].last()}=2 and {Template Juniper MX SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.31.1.1.1.18.[{#IFNAME}].str(this_does_not_exist)}=0

trigger_prototype.name: {HOSTNAME} {#SNMPVALUE} - Memory Usage above 70%
trigger_prototype.description: Verify routing table size Verify System Processes in use Review system logs

trigger_prototype.name: {HOSTNAME} {#SNMPVALUE} - Memory Usage above 95%
trigger_prototype.description: Verify routing table size Verify System Processes in use Review system logs

trigger_prototype.name: {HOSTNAME} {#SNMPVALUE} - High temperature
trigger_prototype.description: Check status of Fans Check ambient temperature and device spacing requirements

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Juniper MX SNMPv3:jnxOperatingCPU.[{#SNMPVALUE}].min(180)}>80 and {Template Juniper MX SNMPv3:jnxOperatingCPU.[{#SNMPVALUE}].min(180)}<95 and {Template Juniper MX SNMPv3:jnxOperating5MinLoadAvg.[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}>100
trigger_prototype.name: {HOSTNAME} {#SNMPVALUE} - CPU Usage above 80%
trigger_prototype.description:
Active Investigation recommended if increase is sudden or sustained on upper range and load average is also > 100
Disable traceoptions Clean up storage Verify system processes

trigger_prototype.name: {HOSTNAME} {#SNMPVALUE} - High CPU Usage (95%)
trigger_prototype.description:
Device responsiveness for self traffic is likely to be impacted
Disable traceoptions Clean up storage Verify system processes
